description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The long awaited sequel! Thousands of shuttles stand before the Unnamed Hero and an alien Mastermind. As the Earth burns, one ship rises to the challenge. Old school twin stick shooter featuring challenging missions with unique locations and bosses.
description.short: The long awaited sequel! Thousands of shuttles stand before the Unnamed Hero and an alien Mastermind. As the Earth burns, one ship rises to the challenge. Old school twin stick shooter featuring challenging missions with unique locations and bosses.
